price: 42. Iš tiesų, Allahas žino, ko jie šaukiasi vietoj Jo. Jis yra Visa Galingas, Visa Išmintingas.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yadʿūna min dūnihi min shayin wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
